reviews.comments: Excelente ubicación y atención inmejorable
La ubicación es excelente! Limpieza y comunicación. Flexibilidad. Súper recomendable
Todo estuvo genial

Excelente estadía! María muy agradable y siempre manteniendo fluida comunicación! La casa tal cual se ve en las fotos, muy cómoda y perfectamente acondicionada! Sin duda volvería a elegirla! Agradezco la flexibilidad en los horarios de ingreso y salida! Muy valioso!

para empezar debo contarles que la anfitriona fue excelente en su atención desde el principio hasta el final de la estadía ,la casa es  muy linda funcional y cómoda en sus espacios con decoración de muy buen gusto, fuimos un grupo de amigos y nos sentimos como en casa  , limpieza impecable ,la ubicación excelente , sin dudas un lugar super recomendable de esos que uno quiere volver siempre , saludos !!!

Excelente propuesta  en todos los aspectos. Desde la ubicación, equipamiento y ambientación hasta la excelente atención de María, en todos los detalles. Todo fue excelente  y lo pasamos genial. 
La casa tiene mucha onda!!! Es ideal para ir con amigos o familia y disfrutar a pleno de Palermo en todas sus expresiones. Lo recomendamos volveremos sin dudas!!!
Muchas gracias!!!

Muy buena experiencia, la casa está ubicada en una zona inmejorable, con muchos bares a la vuelta, una zona bohemia chic pero aún así no es ruidosa la casa, habitaciones amplias, con aire, ideal para grupos, no conocimos a Daniel pero si a María quien se porto muy bien con nosotros, nos dio un mapa y nos indicó los principales lugares históricos y restaurantes para ir por la zona, La Cocina bien equipada, la casa es más linda de lo que parece en las fotos, definitivamente recomiendo alojarse en esta casa, muchas gracias Daniel y María!

Apartamento bien localizado, amplio ,buen aire acondicionado y servicio de internet . Las instalaciones de baño y cocina requieren de renovación.
Anfitriona muy amable y pendiente.
Excelente ubicación. Piso muy confortable y acogedor.

muy linda casa, muy comoda y espaciosa. 

lamentablemente arriba del patio estan en obras y a las 8 am del sabado (nos acostamos a las 6am)  nos despertaron con muchisimo ruido y fue imposible volver a conciliar el sueño
reviews.response: Mauro, agradecemos mucho tu visita y tu buena onda. Lamentamos el ruido pero bueno es una obra que está al lado de nuestra casa  en la que justo cuando ustedes vinieron se pusieron a levantar la pared. No es algo que pudiéramos prever en el momento de la reserva y lo lamentamos mucho.

reviews.comments: Pasamos un gran fin de semana en la casa de Maria. La casa en grande, con muchos dormitorios, todos estuvimos muy cómodos. Nos atendió muy amablemente, nos ayudo en todo. Seguro volveremos pronto!
La casa muy prolija.

La ubicacion es muy buena, en Pleno Palermo Viejo / Soho. La casa es muy practica y con los ambientes bien separados y amplios. Ideal para ir con grupos de amigos o en familia. Tiene algunos detalles de mantenimiento pero nada grave (Ejemplo, algunas luces quemadas, sin agua caliente en uno de los baños, y no mucho mas). Los anfitriones siempre atentos a cualquier necesidad ya sea por la casa o por lo que sea. Recomendable!

Fuimos con 10 amigas y pasamos una muy buena estadía. Nos sorprendió que la casa es mas grande y mas linda de lo que las fotos transmiten. Muy cómoda y super bien ubicada. A cuadras de tiendas, boliches, plaza serrano. Ideal para moverse a pie. 
Maria y Daniel fueron muy atentos. 
Quedamos todas re conformes, volveríamos!

Muy linda casa, cada uno de los ambientes en perfectas condiciones. Daniel muy amable y siempre disponible ante cualquier duda. Le pedimos que nos ayude con una parrilla para la casa y la consiguió para nosotros sin ningún problema.

La casa está ubicada en un barrio muy bonito, con muchos restaurantes y bares, un ambiente muy cosmopolita y agradable, por la noche es algo ruidoso, pero nada de que preocuparse.
La casa es muy cómoda, los baños y la cocina son nuevos y muy bien equipados.
Daniel se mantuvo en contacto para darnos información de la ciudad, paseos y servicios disponibles en el barrio.
Muy buena experiencia.
Muy buena ubicación, disposición e infraestructura!! Excelente elección!!

Excelente ubicación, casa grande y amplia. Fue ideal para un grupo de 6 personas. El living es perfecto para compartir. Daniel nos estaba esperando a la hora acordada, nos entregó recomendaciones muy buenas. Siempre estuvo preocupado que estuviera todo bien y respondió muy rápido cualquier consulta que realizamos. 100% recomendable.

"La experiencia de estar en Casa en Buenos Aires" 
Eso es en poca palabras el resumen de nuestra (URL HIDDEN) verdad fue increíble estar en una casa, es muy acogedora y con un gran anfitrión, dispuesto a todo lo que necesitáramos y dándonos excelentes tips' para tener aún más grata la estadía.
Todo en buen estado. Y muy cómodo.
Nos tocaron días de lluvia y la casa siempre estaba temperada como un hogar.
GRACIAS DANIEL!! Volveremos!

La casa fue tal como se ve por la pagina de web. Todo en orden, prolija y muy bien ubicado. Está cerca de todas las tiendas y restaurantes.
Cuando tuvimos un problema Daniel se nos arregló lo antes posible. Fue muy amigable con todo lo que necesitabamos.
Definitivamente si son un grupo grande la casa de Daniel es perfecto.
Tuvimos una buena experiencia, la comunicación con Daniel siempre fue muy fluida.

Excelente ubicación, excelente anfitrión.  Demás adiós preocupado y atento.  Barrio agradable y estábamos cerca de todos los restaurantes y del carrete para la noche, era todo caminable. Debo felicitar a Daniel y su ayudante porque fueron unos excelentes anfitriones. Puede ser que en la cama matrimonial entrando a mano izquierda le pusieran algo para que no haya tanta bulla ya que al ser una zona transitada camina mucha gente a cualquier hora del día.  Pero el resto todo super bien
Nos fuimos muy felices con mía amigas.  Gracais por todo.

La casa de Daniel no sólo es grande y cómoda, sino que además está en una locación inmejorable. A cuadras de Plaza Serrano y todos los comercios y restaurantes que la rodean, está perfectamente ubicada cerca de todo. La calle es luminosa, tranquila y transitada, lo cual la hace segura a la hora de salir de noche. La zona es perfecta para moverse caminando. Ideal para estar con niños, el patio es hermoso. Volvería mil veces sin dudarlo.
Todo perfecto. La casa es grande, muy buena capacidad y muy bien ubicada y segura. Daniel es muy buen anfitrión y puntal.

Excelente lugar, buena ubicación, muy bien cuidada la casa y adicionalmente, tanto el anfitrión como la persona a cargo estuvieron preocupados de que la estadía fuese agradable.

RECOMENDADA!

Muy buena casa! Excelente ubicación y muy cómoda! Tuvimos un inconveniente con uno de los baños pero siempre se preocuparon por solucionarlo. 
Muy recomendable!!

Pasamos muy bien en la casa, es sumamente cómoda. La ubicación era muy buena y Daniel un excelente anfitrión que estuvo siempre presente atendiendo todo lo que necesitáramos. 
La casa nos pareció un poco mas deteriorada de lo que aparecía en la pagina

La casa espectacular, muy espaciosa, excelente ubicación a cuadras de boliches, restaurants y un barrio con mucha onda y seguro.

Daniel fue un excelente anfitrión, nos aconsejó los mejores lugares y nos dió todas las libertades que queriamos cómo grupo.

Si vuelvo a Buenos Aires de seguro será en Palermo Soho en la casa de Daniel.

La estadía en la casa de Daniel fue inmejorable. Una casa completa con buena calefaccion y muy amplia. Ideal para grupos de amigos grandes que quieran ir a pasar muy bien a BsAs. De cualquier manera lo mejor de la casa es la ubicación! Podes llegar caminando a muchos bares, boliches y discotecas que se encuentran en la zona.
La ubicación inmejorable, tenes todo a solo cuadras de distancia. La casa muy acogedora, baños y cocina nuevas! Nos quedamos con amigas y la pasamos genial! Daniel mil gracias, impecable!

Una excelente experiencia en una inmejorable ubicación. Fuimos en grupo a celebrar a uno que se nos casa pronto (despedida de soltero) y está muy cercana a muchos pubs y discos.

Además hay restaurantes muy cerca (la cabrera, uno de los más tradicionales, a 2-3 cuadras).

Daniel se encontraba fuera del país, pero nos recibió Agueda un 10!!! Muy buena anfitriona y nos tenía además unos encargos que le pedimos para el primer día.

Muchas gracias y de seguro los recomendaremos!!!

Nos encantó nuestra estancia en Buenos Aires. La casa de Daniel es maravilloso, y era un gran anfitrión. La ubicación de la casa no podría ser mejor.  Todo en la casa funcionó a la perfección, las habitaciones son muy espaciosas, las habitaciones son muy amplias y el baño era otimo. Sin dudda mi quedaro novamente a la casa.
La casa es tal como sale en el anuncio, una casa con encanto en el corazón de Palermo.

Fuimos 7 amigos y la casa está buenísima! 2 pisos, 4 habitaciones, todas con aire acondicionado que funciona excelente.  También 3 baños completos. Además un living-comedor amplio, con un cielo muy alto que deja una sensación muy rica. La cocina completa. Lo único que echamos de menos es una parrilla para los asados y cortinas en algunas habitaciones. La ubicación, sinceramente, es la mejor que te puede tocar en Buenos Aires. En el corazón de Palermo, a 1 cuadra de todos los boliches y restoranes, además de kioskos, mini markets para comprar lo que necesites.  Por último, la buena onda y disposición del dueño, espectacular! Lo recomendamos!

Es un sitio maravilloso y muy bien atendido por Daniel su anfitrión!
Aunque el segundo piso es muy caliente, el resto de la casa, incluidos los otros dos cuartos del primer piso, la sala y la cocina, son MUY BUENOS, muy acogedores!
Estuvimos mi esposo, nuestros padres adultos mayores y yo y nos gozamos mucho todos los alrededores de la casa, es un barrio muy lindo y con muchas opciones para todos los gustos.
¡No se lo pierda si va a quedarse en Buenos Aires, es el mejor sitio!

La maison est parfaite, très jolie et placée dans un quartier vivant, avec plein de bars et restaurants. Cependant elle conserve un certain calme avec ses espaces spacieux, son patio intérieur et sa petite terrasse. Tout le groupe a passé un super séjour et si nous avons besoin d'héberger de nouveau des groupes cela sera sans aucun doute notre premier choix. La communication avec Maria a été excellente et nous n'avons manqué de rien. Très recommandé!

This is a traditional house in the coolest neighborhood of Buenos Aires. Even on the hottest days of the year the AC is amazing and the high ceilings make for the perfect cool atmosphere. I love this casa!!!

We rented to house for some workmates coming from abroad.
The house is beautiful, spacious and located in a nice area for tourists, with plenty of bars, pubs and restaurants around.
Daniel was really nice, quick to answer any inquiry and always willing to help.
We'll probably rent this place again. I totally recommend!

The location of this house was perfect for visiting BA, near sights and parks and restaurants and grocery stores while still being quiet and residential. The house had a lot of bedrooms, some of which can be configured in different ways with separate twin beds or together for a double. Having the common areas, living room and courtyard and kitchen was very fun for our group of two families. Maria was a wonderful and friendly host and Barbara had everything so clean. It isn't luxurious, but the location and abundance of space worked great for us.

I grannfastigheten byggs ett parkeringshus vilket medför mycket oljud kl 07.45-17. Det går därför inte att sitta på innergården dagtid eftersom det är oljud och byggmaterial som faller ner. I 3 av sovrummen och på terrassen är det påtagligt  trafikstört från gatan. I 2 av sovrummen finns ingen AC.  I flera av sovrummen finns det endast ljus gardin. Inredningen är lite sliten, köksutrustningen något gammal. Men huset har charm och ligger i ett trevligt område.

Could not have found a better place to stay in Palermo, hands down. The house is a great size, and is perfectly located in Palermo Soho. Maria was absolutely incredible throughout the entire process, and even greeted us close to midnight as our flight was severely delayed. We were super lucky to stay here and had an absolute wonderful time!
Great location. Nice and spacious for a large group.  Good referrals for transportation and trips. Helpful check-in.

Our group stayed at Daniel's place for 10 days in November and loved it.  It has a great feel about it and is so comfortable to stay in.  Wifi was excellent and showers good.  The Location was great - close to shops and restaurants and in a safe neighbourhood.   The subway was about 10 blocks away and taxis were easy to get outside the door.   Maria was an excellent host and responded and helped us with a few queries.   We would definitely stay here again when in Buenos Aires and highly recommend Daniel's place.

Great location, huge house with an outstanding balcony. They were very helpful when problems arose. There was nearby construction noise in the morning but that shouldn’t be an on going issue. Would highly recommend

The house in Palermo is excellent located. Surrounded by restaurants and bars it lends to a fun nightlife. The house itself is spacious with comfy common areas. Our trip was made better by Maria. She kept in constant contact and offered us great tips to enjoy our visit. Maria also arranged our airport transfer with Andy and Oscar which were outstanding.

Já esperávamos uma casa bem cuidada, mas a realidade superou expectativas!
Além de linda e estilosa, o tamanho da casa também era ideal: acomodamos 11 pessoas de maneira super confortável.
A localização era excelente, a casa possuia tudo que podiamos precisar (de toalhas a adaptadores universais) e os hóspedes foram super solicitos.
Obrigada por tudo, Maria! Foi incrivel!
Great location and hospitality! Definitely coming back one day.

A vibrant house in a thoroughly enjoyable part of the city. Large enough for multiple guests, and a nice courtyard outside to share meals. There is lots of natural light upstairs. The downstairs bedroom was quite damp at the beginning of the trip, though this was largely resolved with a dehumidifier. The wifi can also be unreliable at times, though a router restart will usually fix the problem. We found the water heating to be unpredictable for showering. The neighbourhood is fantastic with some of the best eating, drinking and shopping in the city. Overall we enjoyed our stay

A localização da casa é maravilhosa e o bairro Palermo Soho também. Além de alguns problemas técnicos (como o vazamento de água da banheira de cima, o microondas que não estava funcionando e a televisão que só pode ser ligada quando o wi-fi é desligado, por exemplo) tivemos uma boa estadia. A comunicação com a Maria foi 100% e ela foi muito solícita conosco. A casa não tinha filtro de água e acho que isso poderia ter sido comunicado na descrição ou alertado por eles. No geral foi uma ótima experiência e voltaríamos!
Beautiful house in a great location. Maria & Daniel were fantastic hosts. Spoke English and gave us detailed information for the area and local restaurants etc. Definitely recommend.
Une tres belle maison, dans un quartier tres sympathique et vivant.
Ótima localização da casa, comunicação fluida com anfitrião e espaço muito confortável.  Recomendo a casa.
Both hosts were so accommodating and in constant communication. The house is quaint, cozy and comfortable, while also a decent walk from the wonderful area of Palermo.
This place is perfect. The rooms are comfortable. The shared spaces are cozy. The location is unbeatable. I would stay here again in a heartbeat. And Maria was lovely, kind, and helpful.

We could not have been happier with our stay. The location suited us perfectly and the house was just what we needed for our city break in Buenos Aires. Daniel and Maria were fantastic hosts and went above and beyond to assist us when some important items were left behind.

The rooms are spacious and comfortable and we had everything we needed for a happy and fun stay. 

The location is great for exploring Palermo, in walking distance to lovely coffee and food options and with supermarkets, dry cleaners and other amenities in walking distance.

Highly recommend.

Daniel's place was perfect for us.  We loved the patio and the location is the best. Great for big groups. The only issue was that the Internet doesn't reach all the rooms and sometimes wasn't working. Maria (Daniel co-host) welcome us with a bottle of delicious Malbec. Overall, great place to stay in the heart of Palermo. We recommend it to all. Muchas gracias!

Daniel was responsive throughout the entire booking process.  He went above and beyond when an over-booking occurred on our last night.  I had changed the original reservation and the extended night got double booked.  Daniel found alternative accommodations for all 6 of us at a local hotel and wouldn't let us pay for the night.  The house itself was perfect for us.  We had 6 adults so having 3 bathrooms was great.  We spent a lot of time in the lower courtyard after a day of exploring the city.  The place has some "charms" from being an older home, but nothing that bothered me in the least.  If you are looking for super high end, this may not be the home for you, but it was just what we were looking for.  The neighborhood is safe with lots of restaurants and shops to walk to.  The walk to the subway was very doable even for the elderly members of our group.  I would not hesitate to recommend Daniel's place to any friends.

Daniel's house is fantastic -- just as advertised, in the beautiful barrio of Palermo. The house itself is clean, spacious, and very quiet at night. And it's right in the middle of Palermo Soho, one of the nicest neighborhoods in Buenos Aires. Within walking distance, there are dozens of restaurants, bars, clubs, and grocery/convenience stores.

And Daniel himself was an extremely hospitable host. We arrived quite late on Christmas Eve, and he was there to meet us and show us around the house. His recommendations for food and wine landed us some of the best meals in the country, and he added a couple HUGE personal touches to our trip that took us to a local art gallery and to the Tigre Delta for a wonderful day-trip.

Thanks largely to him, our week in Buenos Aires was truly unforgettable, and we're already excited to one day return!
A great spot in an eclectic area with tons of restaurants and boutiques. Fit 2 families with children well. A nice patio to have your morning cup of coffee. We would return in the future.

Daniel was very welcoming, had someone meet us at the scheduled time and came by the next day to say high and check in.

The place had ample space and great flow from one area to another as well as air flow when we were not using the a/c units. We made great use of the both exterior areas, kitchen and laundry.

The area is great for local food and bars, easy to navigate and become familiar with quickly. Some should be avoided such as Rave.... We did have excellent means at Osaka a quick cab ride or 20 minute walk as well as at Il Matterello, just a couple of blocks down Goritti and the same goes for La Babrica del Taco. Also great for local craft fairs and if you venture for a 15-20 minute walk you are on Sante Fe and the subte is there as well as parks and other craft areas.

Daniel was accommodating for a "late" check out, we were allowed to hang out in the common area while the cleaning staff worked on the bedrooms and bathrooms.

We would definitely stay there again. We did share with Daniel that some updates are needed, as the photos are not a current representation of the space and some small items should be addressed, and the space and location compensated for them.

We loved staying here! Brilliant location and the house was big enough for all 5 of us to have our own rooms. Only one room didn't have aircon, which was fine but worth noting. 

We also had a couple unexpected visits from the owner picking things up and dropping off laundry for the next guests, but it was all totally fine. Everything was very casual but respectful and friendly. Would definitely stay here again!

Merci à Daniel pour son accueil. La maison est spacieuse et idéalement située à Palermo. Restaurants, bars, boulangeries et supermarchés sont nombreux dans le coin! Le patio est très agréable.
Pour les tangueros, elle est tout près d'au moins trois milongas (Salon Canning, Villa Malcolm et la Viruta). Nous y reviendrons avec grand plaisir.
Location spacieuse  et bien equipee mais tres bruyante car mal isolee et donnant sur une rue tres passante ( circulation)

Daniel was great to work with.  Our plans changed a bit during the week, but Daniel was flexible and understanding. The neighborhood is definitely  exciting--loads of restaurants, breweries, shops, etc.   Everything within walking distance, including train stations, bus stops and subway station.  We would have been able to stay in the neighborhood without ever leaving.  But it was also located close enough to the city so that we could choose to go wherever we wanted!!
Everything was great....good location for everything!!

Excellent location. A great neighbourhood with plenty of shops and restaurants within walking distance. Daniel was a great host - very friendly and helpful and provided us with a list of recommended bars and restaurants.

Daniel's communication was excellent from the start and on arrival he gave us a good list of recommended eating places, shopping areas etc and was happy to answer any of our questions. Palermo Soho is a great place to stay with lots of good restaurant s within walking distance, and shops also.
The stairs up to the top level are very steep and difficult with large bags, but possible!

As a regular AirB&B user and host, i know that most problems arise when expectations and reality do not match. In this case our expectations were high and we were disappointed, however Daniel was gracious and did his very best to make us comfortable and happy.

The house is in a great location, it is large bright and clean and would be fine for a large family or group of young friends. It is however old and tired and not nearly as upmarket as the pictures would indicate. So if style and comfort are important this may not be right for you, but if big house in great location then yes.

House is well located in a friendly neighbourhood in easy walking distance to many great restaurants, bars. Daniel's "recommend" list was spot on. The shopping in the area was great too and if you want to explore the city access to buses and the subway was relatively easy to find from this location. If you are planning to sleep at night over the weekend, be warned, you will need earplugs as the neighbourhood does not sleep.

Daniel's place was awesome. A big group of colleagues came back for the second time this year cause the group last year had such a nice time at Daniel's place. It is great for a group and in such a nice location.
This house is in a fantastic neighborhood with lots of restaurants and nightlife.  Daniel was very responsive and helpful during our stay, and we had a great time.

Our stay at Daniel's was great. From the time I reserved the house, Daniel was fantastic to work with and because he is a long time resident of the area, he possesses a wealth of information and knowledge which he is happy to share. He was always extremely proactive in answering any questions I had prior to our arrival as well as helping us out while we were there. The house is very spacious and had everything we needed. It is located in a trendy, safe part of Buenos Aires close to shopping and amazing restaurants. With the exception of Italy, I had the best pasta I've ever eaten and I only had to walk one block to get it. I highly recommend Daniel's house and if we ever make it back to Buenos Aires, we would definitely stay there again.
reviews.response: It was a great pleasure meeting you and your family. Come back soon!

reviews.comments: Located in the perfect location in Palermo Soho.   Great restaurants within walking distance.  Home is very spacious.  Host is easily accessible.
Daniel's place was a nice sanctuary in the middle of Palermo. Very well located in Palermo and charming historic house.

The location of this house is fantastic. Centrally located in the fun neighborhood of Palermo Soho, my friends and I could easily walk to many restaurants and bars. David was easy to get in touch with and responsive to questions/concerns. The apartment was clean and cozy although some of the furniture could use some updating. We had ample room for 6 of us - easily could have accommodated 3 or 4 more guests.

La maison de Daniel est pleine de charme, avec une très belle bibliothèque, une décoration soignée et l'âme d'une vraie maison de famille. La maison est très spacieuse, avec 5 grandes chambres (avec une literie neuve et vraiment confortable), 3 salles de bain, un bel espace à vivre à l'intérieur et un joli patio qui permet de prendre le café ou le petit déjeuner à l'extérieur dès les premiers rayons de soleil. Le quartier est très vivant avec plein de jolies boutiques et un grand choix de bars, de restaurants, de cafés et de pâtisseries. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour.

Wir (eine gemischte Reisegruppe, ältere und jüngere Reisende, aus Deutschland/Chile/Thailand) waren eine knappe Woche in Daniels Haus zu Gast. Beschreibung von Lage und Anfahrt waren hilfreich, die Unterstützung von Daniel hinsichtlich Restaurants in der Nähe, Taxi zur Fähre etc. hat uns gut gefallen. Obwohl wir sehr spät abends vom Flughafen ankamen hat Daniel auf uns gewartet und einen informativen Durchgang durchs Haus gegeben. Das Haus mit seiner Aufteilung auf verschiedene Schlafräume (alle mit air-condition) und Ebenen (nicht zu vergessen die verschiedenen Bäder !) war für unsere Bedürfnisse perfekt. In der Nähe kann man gut ausgehen und einkaufen. Zu Fuss ist man in etwa 20 Minuten an der Plaza Italia (U-Bahn usw), verschiedene Busse fahren direkt um die Ecke ab. Ausstattung (von Bettwäsche und Handtüchern bis zum frischen Stück Seife an jedem Waschbecken, ausreichend Geschirr, Vorrat an Mülltüten...) war top. Und die Waschmaschine haben wir auch gern genutzt... Die Umgebung macht auch am Abend einen sicheren Eindruck. Einige Einkaufsmöglichkeiten (auch für späten Einkauf) ganz in der Nähe. Check-out war unkompliziert. Wir denken gern an unsere Tage in BsAs zurück !

Daniel was amazing! He had everything planned out very well and made out stay extremely simple. The house was impeccable and we thoroughly enjoyed it. We also made use of the 20% discount at a delicious burger place next door!

Palermo Soho is probably the best place to stay for a foreigner in Buenos Aires.

Daniel's house in Palermo was perfect. It was in the best location, with tons of great restaurants and bar close by. Even if we never left the area we could have found something new to do walking-distance every night. The house itself was so big, enough for everyone of us to have our own room which is a rarity and a luxury. It also has three bathrooms which was also a lifesaver when we all needed to shower and get ready within a span of one hour. Everything was very clean and the beds were comfortable. Daniel is also super friendly, helpful, and the most responsive host I've ever communicated with. I'd text him with a question and he would usually respond within a minute. Overall we had a great experience and would definitely stay here again.
Great house for a large group. The host was easy to communicate with and catered to our needs. Awesome location for restaurants and nightlife.

Daniel was an impeccable host and really epitomized what AirBNB is all about: being a welcome ambassador to his home city. Not only was he attentive to our needs, but he went out of the way to offer any assistance and was quick to respond to our questions.

His house was comfortable for our larger group (6) and was very well located. I would recommend that people staying overnight on a Saturday bring earplugs as action in the neighborhood goes very late and Argentinians like to have fun. Otherwise, I can't wait to go back!

Daniel was very accommodating. He answered all of our questions prior to arriving and was very resourceful during our stay. The house was larger than expected. It was very comfortable for our group. It can easily fit approximately 10 people. The area of Palermo Soho is very lively at night, many things to do, and very close to public transportation. Highly recommend!!!!

Foi muito agradável estar na casa de Daniel. É muito bem localizada e conta com toda estrutura necessária. Daniel atendeu prontamente todas nossas questões. Nos deu indicações de passeios que foram bem proveitosas.

Daniel is an excellent host and has a beautiful home in the heart of Palermo. Daniel spent a half hour during check in showing us around and providing an exhaustive list of things to do and eat in the neighborhood. The house is extremely convenient with easy walkable distances to both soho and Hollywood areas. Would definitely recommend this unit and any others that Daniel may have.
Excellent host shared favorite local hang out spots everything clean

Daniel was at the house to meet us which was fantastic given that we had lost our means of communication for a few days so he wasn't sure exactly when we were arriving. He also gave us a list of favourite restaurants which was wonderful. The house was as described and provided lots of space for my family of 5. The house is really well  located  for restaurants, design stores and galleries. Daniel was so easy to communicate with during our stay.

The perfect host and the perfect house. The location of this huge house is fantastic, in the middle of Palermo with everything you need within a few blocks. The house is ideal for a big group and leaves nothing to be desired. Everything you see on the pictures is there and in good condition. Daniel is a great host. He met us and showed us around, and when we let him know that there weren't any wine glasses and the coffee maker was broken, he brought glasses and a brand new coffee machine within a couple of hours. I would recommend this place to everyone!

Daniel was an excellent host.  His Palermo Soho House property could not have fit our group better.  The area has many great restaurants and bars, and is also very safe and walkable.  Daniel gave us many great recommendations as well and was easy to get in touch with if needed.  A perfect place to stay when visiting Buenos Aires!

We enjoyed our stay, although one should note that the curb appeal is not as picturesque as the posted photograph, and that the street noise can become quite loud at times (but often softened by the noise from the air conditioners).  We found Daniel to be a great host -- quite apologetic when the air conditioners were not working on our arrival, he had folks out the next day to repair them (taking 4-5 hours).  The kitchen is quite modest but serviceable.  There is a great hamburger place right next door, and ice cream shop just down the street, and heaps of other restaurants, small markets and shops within walking distance.  The beds are comfortable, and water pressure good in all the showers.  The place was very clean upon arrival and we had no problems with finding parking on the street.

Daniel's house was a fantastic home base to explore an awesome neighborhood. Palermo Soho is full of great shops and great restaurants. The house is big and private, with plenty of room for lots of people, and was very comfortable. Daniel was very helpful and easygoing about arrival and departure, and gave us lots of friendly tips on things to do. Would stay here again.

Daniel's home in Palermo Soho couldn't have  been in a better location! Everything from cafes, restaurants, jazz clubs, bars and much more was within walking distance from the house which was perfect. If the destination was to far to walk, we simply walked out the front door and hailed a cab, it couldn't have been more convenient. Daniel provided us with a list of places to go before we arrived and all of his suggestions were excellent. In a short period of time, our group explored so much of Buenos Aires. Whenever we needed something, we would message Daniel and he would respond within the hour. He told us exactly where to go to exchange currency for the best rate possible which was a huge bonus, especially when it came to shopping and dining!  I recommend anyone who is interested in exploring Buenos Aires to stay in the Palermo Soho home!

Cheers,
Alana

Our stay at Daniel's house was great. The house is perfect for a big group. It was clean and well equipped. Daniel is a great host and helped us with all our questions, replied really quick and gave us perfect recommendations for places to eat.
Due to the bad weather there were some problems with the water heather but as soon as we rang him he was there to fix the problem. In a word: I will recommend this place to everyone!

Our stay in buenos aires was absolutely awesome. Daniel the host is an extremely friendly and knowledgable man who clearly loves his city and making sure that his guests have the best time possible. From the moment we arrived at 2am - Daniel was there to welcome us with a wealth of knowledge and really went above and beyond to ensure we were happy and has lots of recommendations. Throughout our trip Daniel was readily available to answer any questions we had and was always happy to help. The house itself if fantastic and gives you a real feel of Beunos Aires lifestyle. Palermo the area is really fun and has a great vibe with countless bars and restaurants available at your doorstep. The walk to the metro was not far and getting around was easy. My group of 7 could not have asked for anything more booking this place and meeting daniel. If you book this place you will not be disappointed. Thank you again for your hospitality Daniel we loved meeting you and look forward to coming back to BA again one day soon. Muchas Gracias.

The property is just like what we see on the pictures: beautifully decorated, spacious and comfortable. Great for large groups of friends and families. In addition, the property is fully air conditioned and heated. Check in and check out were smooth and quick. Daniel received us so early in the morning (7am), for which we are very grateful.  The location is the best in the city, great for shopping, dining, clubbing and sightseeing. Palermo Soho's mos famous restaurants, cafes, and shops are all within walking distance, and sometimes just a few steps away (like Casa Cruz and Crizia). Palermo Hollywood is also very close to the property, (5-10 minute walk). There is one supermarket just around the corner. We're definitely staying there again when we come back to Buenos Aires!!

Daniel was a great host. He was very accommodating. One of us arrived at 4:30am, and Daniel didn't have any issues getting him the key, so our friend could get into the house to get some sleep. Daniel also provided a restaurant and bar recommendations, plus a place to exchange money, which was of great help. 
The house looks exactly how it represented in the pictures. It's a great place for big group.  Perfect location.  One thing to be concerned with is it can be a little loud if you are in the front rooms late in the evening/early mornings, since it near a bar. We were there Friday and Saturday nights. But you are in Buenos Aires and should be out enjoying the night life anyway:)

Daniel's place was great. There was ample space for a big group of work colleagues to sleep, cook, and hang out. Daniel was super easy to coordinate with and made the trip really great--accommodating requests for additional cleaning services and checkout/checkin time. My colleagues had a fantastic time at his place and would highly recommend the house and the location. Plus they even had fun reading the books throughout the house. It was an excellent experience.

Nossa estadia foi incrivel! A casa é super bem localizada, perto de varios restaurantes, cafes, bares... Esta na melhor area de palermo! Os quartos estavam super bem arrumados e limpos. Ela tem um terraço delicioso!
Com certeza, é uma otima pedida para quem vai viajar em grupos.
Daniel foi super atencioso e disposto a ajudar em qq duvida que tinhamos. Recomendo! :)
reviews.response: Obrigado Luciana - I hope you come back soon.

reviews.comments: After 4 week on being on the go around South America, Daniel's house in Palermo was the perfect place to relax before a long flight back to Australia. The location was excellent with many restaurants and bars nearby, but it was great to be able have all 7 of us together and a great deal of time was spent telling stories of our adventures with a nice glass of red. Daniel was a perfect host and was always there to help and to suggest place to go, i personally enjoyed breakfast at Ninia's. I wish we could have stayed for longer, I could happily spend many day's exploring the local area.

Daniel was a great host and was able to provide us with valuable suggestions that made our time in Buenos extremely enjoyable. The place is in a great location and looked as described in the pictures. If I come back to Buenos I would stay at one of his properties again.

Had the most amazing time in Buenos Aires- this house was in a terrific location. Our group of 6 had ample space to have our own rooms/beds/bathrooms and still feel like we were together. We had a blast sitting outside enjoying a glass of wine (daniel recommended the cutest wine shop in the neighborhood!) and mingling in the living room. The kitchen was perfect for whipping up breakfasts, snacks and everything in between.  This house, Daniel's knowledge, recommendations and hospitality could not be more recommended. Our trip would not have been the same without Daniel and our stay- and we are very thankful for that. A must stay!!
